summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the functionality of OGR geometry objects, covering creation, type identification, serialization formats (WKT, WKB, GML, JSON, HEX), spatial predicates (contains, intersects, touches, within, overlaps, disjoint, crosses), topological operations (union, intersection, difference, symdifference), dimensional handling (2D/3D), coordinate system transformations, and edge cases such as empty geometries and pickling.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of GIS geometry processing within applications that rely on OGR, enabling accurate spatial analysis, data exchange, and coordinate reference system transformations.
